title: 1dplot.py
description: This program is for making images to visualize columns of numbers from 1D text files. It uses Python, particularly matplotlib, to create plots.

infiles.title: Input files
infiles.description: One or more file names of text files. Each column in this file will be treated as a separate time series for plotting.

prefix.title: Output prefix
prefix.description: Output filename or prefix. Default output image type is .jpg

boxplot_on.title: Boxplot on
boxplot_on.description: A fun feature to show an additional boxplot adjacent to each time series

bplot_view.title: Boxplot view
bplot_view.description: Adjust view for boxplots when using censoring

margin_off.title: Margin off
margin_off.description: Fill the plot frame completely, thus no labels, frame, or titles will be visible

scale.title: Scale
scale.description: Provide a list of scales to apply to the y-values

xfile.title: X file
xfile.description: One way to input x-values explicitly: as a "1D" file containing a single file of numbers

xvals.title: X values
xvals.description: Provide exactly 3 numbers for x-values: start, stop, and stepsize

ylabels.title: Y labels
ylabels.description: Optional text labels for each 'infile' column

ylabels_maxlen.title: Y labels max length
ylabels_maxlen.description: allows y-axis labels to wrap into multiple rows, each of length <= which the user can decide

legend_on.title: Legend on
legend_on.description: Turn on the plotting of a legend in the plot(s)

xlabel.title: X label
xlabel.description: Optional text labels for the abscissa/x-axis

title.title: Title
title.description: Optional title for the set of plots

reverse_order.title: Reverse order
reverse_order.description: Reverses the order of plotted time series

sepscl.title: Separate scale
sepscl.description: Make each graph have its own y-range

one_graph.title: One graph
one_graph.description: Plot multiple infiles in a single subplot

dpi.title: DPI
dpi.description: Choose the output image's DPI. Default value is 150

figsize.title: Figure size
figsize.description: Choose the output image's dimensions (units are inches)

fontfamily.title: Font family
fontfamily.description: Change font-family used; default is monospace

fontstyles.title: Font styles
fontstyles.description: Add a specific font name; should match with chosen font-family

colors.title: Colors
colors.description: Decide what color(s) to cycle through in plots (one or more)

patches.title: Patches
patches.description: Specify run lengths for background patches to distinguish runs

censor_trs.title: Censor TRs
censor_trs.description: Specify time points where censoring has occurred using AFNI index notation

censor_files.title: Censor files
censor_files.description: Specify time points where censoring has occurred using one or more 1D files

censor_hline.title: Censor horizontal line
censor_hline.description: Add a dotted horizontal line to the plot, representing the censor threshold

censor_rgb.title: Censor RGB
censor_rgb.description: Choose the color of the censoring background; default is: [1, 0.7, 0.7]

bkgd_color.title: Background color
bkgd_color.description: Change the background color outside of the plot windows. Default is 0.9
